reviews.review_msg: Dr. Krebs knows his stuff inside, outside, backwards, and in the dark. Make sure you have done your readings if you disagree with his point of view. Great class

was very hard to understand, and i found his exams VERY long for the time allotted. the essay seemed interesting but almost the whole class got less than B- (which he then scaled) unless you have a strong bio background, i dont recommend this course. Tho he is a nice guy.
